general.headline: COO & board member at Heuritech
general.mutualConnectionsText: Robin Choy, Vincent Bruneau, and 423 other mutual connections

jobs.description: In charge of the company's strategy & operations aligning business & tech. Managing Product, Data Ops, Marketing & Fashion teams as well as working alongside our CTO to structure our tech.

Heuritech is a fashion technology company that offers brands predictive analytics on trends, sales and stock.

Using advanced artificial intelligence (AI) to translate real-world images shared on social media into meaningful insights, the Heuritech market intelligence platform empowers brands to forecast demand and trends more accurately, produce more sustainably, and achieve unprecedented competitive advantage.

Heuritech collaborates with leading brands worldwide, such as Louis Vuitton, Dior, Adidas, etc.

Heuritech team is composed of 50 people, including 10 PhDs in Artificial Intelligence. Heuritech is backed by French VCs Serena Capital, Elaia, as well as private investors like Pierre D√©nis, CEO of Jimmy Choo and Renaud Visage, co-founder & CTO at Eventbrite. 

As Chief Strategy & Product Officer, I am responsible for:
- (Re)-defining our offer and positioning
- Building and iterating on our products to achieve our ambitious acquisition & adoption goals
- Aligning tech & product teams on a common roadmap focused on bringing stronger value as well as scaling our internal processes
- Communicating and generating buy-in towards Heuritech's goals & strategy internally

I also take part in:
- Fundraising & investors relations
- Go-to-market & pricing
- Budgeting
- Setting up HR processes throughout the company

Let's talk! >> charlotte.fanneau@heuritech.com

- Built the marketing team
- Setup a product organization to iterate on our first product and build an app which is used on a weekly basis by the world's biggest luxury & sportswear players to make better assortment & stock decisions

- Met with over 100 C-levels and operational teams from Fashion, Luxury and beauty to understand biggest pains and strongest potential use cases for our technology
- Defined Heuritech's value proposition & positioning
- Built a SaaS platform for luxury & sportswear brands to anticipate success and decline of their iconic products. Incorportated Heuritech's granular computer vision technology into a user-friendly app for non tech-teams. Sold it to Louis Vuitton as our first recurring client.
- Acted as the first Product Manager of the company, built the product team and infused a product culture in the company.
- Launched marketing, participating in key international events (Shoptalk Las Vega, VivaTech, Decoded Fashion etc.), locking first press articles on our positioning into Fashion and generating inbound leads enabling us to secure our first clients with no sales team.

The community of French Chief Product officers, regrouping top product leaders from French tech companies.

general.headline: Co-founder and COO at Pennylane | Join us to build the leading financial tool for European SMEs üåü

jobs.description:
By connecting all financial data, Pennylane offers a full and detailed overview for business owners to run their business with a clear picture of their finances.

Thanks to Pennylane, CEOs are able to make smarter decisions and facilitate their financial management. Without ever leaving the platform, they have access to real-time and accurate data, a smart invoicing tool, and an efficient management of expenses.

Through numerous automatizations, bookkeepers are able to save time on laborious and repetitive tasks allowing them to spend more time advising their clients.

Business owners use the platform with their existing bookkeeper, in-house or outsourced, or can rely on Pennylane to select the most adequate bookkeeper according to their activity, needs, and location.

Started in 2020, Pennylane already accompanies more than 10,000 French companies and their accountants.
